name: Junkmetal Armor
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Precious Metal Reclaimer" "150929" #L "Robot Junk" "42619" HSR - Sketch and Etch ( ie :#L "HSR - Sketch and Etch - Chestpiece" "162290" ) #L "screwdriver" "150922" or #L "Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Hard Armor)" "162218" (#L "recipe" "/tell recipe 30") ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Precious Metal Reclaimer + Robot Junk = #L "Sheet of Junkmetal" "206703" Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ HSR - Sketch and Etch + Sheet of Junkmetal = Etched Pattern for Junkmetal ( ie : #L "Etched Pattern for Junkmetal Breastplate" "206695" ) Skills: | ME | ------------------------------ Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Hard Armor) + Etched Pattern for Junkmetal = Junkmetal Armor ( ie #L "Junkmetal Breastplate" "206679" ) Skills: | EE,ME | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Increases your max health.
